description:
Inside Out is excited to co-present Socrates at TIFF Next Wave 2019!

Brazilian director Alexandre Moratto's award-winning Socrates is a sad, yet beautiful coming-of-age tale. Fifteen-year-old Socrates must quickly and urgently accept the sudden death of his mother. Beautifully shot in a powerful, collaborative process with youth in Brazil, the film is deeply nuanced, emotionally resonant, and powerful from start to finish. Though it was produced under a tight budget, Socrates is a powerhouse film that shows the strength and courage of a young teen.

No one under 25 turned away for lack of funds! Need a free ticket? Email us at nextwave@tiff.net.
